title: Core API: defineTest(), defineSuite(), run()
description: Implement the core SDK API for defining and running evals as code. This provides a simple, intuitive API for users to write evaluation suites.
acceptance_criteria: defineTest() function creates a test case with input, expected output, and optional scorer
defineSuite() function groups multiple tests with shared config
run() function executes tests and returns structured results
TypeScript types are fully defined and exported
Unit tests cover happy path and edge cases
Example usage in README or docs
notes: Build on top of existing test.ts. Keep API minimal and ergonomic - inspired by Vitest/Jest patterns but for LLM evals.
